alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Northern Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tangipahoa Parish through 330 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wilmer, or near Amite, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Amite, Amite City, Independence, Roseland and Tickfaw. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 38 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
